abstract: Bosnian Serbs vote overwhelmingly in referendum to keep national Statehood Day holiday, despite ruling by Bosnia's highest court that holiday is illegal; Serb Republic Pres Milorad Dodik has been accused of using referendum to set stage for secession vote.

headline.print_headline: Bosnian Serbs Keep Holiday  in a Vote Assailed as Illegal
headline.main: Bosnian Serbs Keep Holiday in Vote Assailed as Illegal

snippet: Bosnia’s international peace envoy, Valentin Inzko, said that the referendum was an attack on Bosnia’s constitutional order and was not legally valid....
lead_paragraph: Bosnia’s international peace envoy, Valentin Inzko, said that the referendum was an attack on Bosnia’s constitutional order and was not legally valid.
